title: An Atlas of Impossible Longing instead

content.question: In context, the word “Instead” that appears in the fourth paragraph demonstrates

choices.label: Nirmal’s inability to become a better father
Bakul’s determination to placate her father’s temper
Nirmal’s immediate plan to return to the high Himalaya
Bakul’s interest in her father’s archaeological records

content.answer: Nirmal’s inability to become a better father

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain the function of a character changing or remaining unchanged.
